enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: On Wednesday, November 4, the COP adopted a decision, recommended by SBI/SBSTA, on mechanisms pursuant to Articles 6,12 and 17 of the Protocol (FCCC/CP/1999/L.15).

The decision requests the SBI/SBSTA Chairs to, inter alia, revise the synthesis of Parties' proposals based on further submissions, consolidate the text, and take it forward, prior to COP-6, as a basis for further negotiations.
It also requests the Chairs to convene intersessional meetings and workshops in preparation for COP-6.
